  • Method Details

    • createAttackZone

      public com.almasb.fxgl.entity.Entity createAttackZone(com.almasb.fxgl.entity.SpawnData data)
      Spawns an attack zone entity that gradually appears and then triggers an explosion. This method uses animation to fade in the attack zone over a specified duration and removes it after the animation.
      Parameters:
      data - The spawn data containing parameters like the radius of the attack zone.
      Returns:
      A newly created attack zone entity with specified properties.

    • createFireball

      public com.almasb.fxgl.entity.Entity createFireball(com.almasb.fxgl.entity.SpawnData data)

    • spawnCircleZone

      public static com.almasb.fxgl.entity.Entity spawnCircleZone(int x, int y, int radius)
      Helper method to spawn a circular attack zone at a specified location.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate for the attack zone.
      y - The y-coordinate for the attack zone.
      radius - The radius of the attack zone.
      Returns:
      The newly spawned attack zone entity.

    • spawnFireball

      public static com.almasb.fxgl.entity.Entity spawnFireball(int x, int y, int oppositeX, int oppositeY)

    • createCircleExplosion

      public static void createCircleExplosion(double x, double y, double rad)
      Creates a visual explosion effect at a given location using an animated texture.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate for the center of the explosion.
      y - The y-coordinate for the center of the explosion.
      rad - The radius of the explosion effect.
